name: Spacecraft
description: Starcraft - a space shooter, in which you have to leave your system and fly to the depths of space, to destroy the army of enemies. Do everything in your power to protect your planet from very big danger.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 1.2 Ghz or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 200 MB DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 180 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP/7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
